Title: Runaway Devaluation
Writer: Ron Weiner, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Carson Mell (executive story editor), Amy Aniobi (story editor), Dan Lyons (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Richard and the guys struggle to find a backer as they face legal and financial woes. Meanwhile, an old enemy pays Richard a visit.
